subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Jonathan Ledecky and Scott Malkin, the buyers of the Islanders, said they would spend the next two years learning from fans and ensuring a smooth transition to Brooklyn as they prepare to take official control of the team in the 2016-17 season.
snippet: Jonathan Ledecky and Scott Malkin, the buyers of the Islanders, said they would spend the next two years learning from fans and ensuring a smooth transition to Brooklyn as they prepare to take official control of the team in the 2016-17 season.
